text: You don"t really need to use the @staticmethod decorator.
Just declaring a method (that doesn't expecet the self parameter) and call it from the class.
The decorator is only there in case you want to be able to call it from an instance as well (which was not what you wanted to do)
Mostly, you just use functions though...
